name: Kirby no Omochabako: Guruguru Ball
overview: Kirby no Omochabako: Guru Guru Ball is the one of the Kirby no Omochabako (Kirby's Toy Box) minigames for the Super Famicom's Japan-only Satellaview service. The game involves sending Kirbys through a long pipe which is designed around the mid-boss Efreeti. The player must land Kirby in the highest-scoring hole possible, and can avoid earlier holes with the right amount of speed.
